Google.title: Reactor Hanging Kit
Google.description: Keep your Reactor stove off the cold ground and make knocking it over impossible with the MSR Reactor Hanging Kit. The simple design clips four wires effectively under the burner head and holds any size of Reactor Pot securely on to the stove, with a sliding runner to adjust the tension. Supplied with a carry pouch, the hanging kit weighs a miniscule 28 grams and packs down tiny, making it a convenient and practical tool for any expedition.

Google.title: * G20 Footprint
Google.description: The Lightwave G20 Footprint offers extra protection for your inner tent groundsheet from wet, mud and sharps on the ground. Lying beneath the inner tent, the 90 denier nylon taffeta adds enough extra durability and waterproofing to let you sleep soundly knowing you're not going to wake up in a puddle. Lightweight and compact in your pack, the footprint also makes striking camp easier as there's no need to get mud everywhere when rolling up the inner. Your tent will thank you for it too, since a footprint improves longevity. A small investment that could save a big expense, you'll feel better pitching your tent on its specifically-shaped footprint.

Google.title: * Jupiter OTG Black Orange Lens
Google.description: Julbo have designed the Jupiter OTG as a large Over the Glasses (OTG) goggle, so wearing your goggles no longer means sacrificing vision. The XL frame, for larger faces, has good ventilation and has an easy fitting foam to adapt to any kind of temple. The Julbo OTG uses an Orange Category 3 double polycarbonate mirror Spectron lens to enable comfortable use in all but the highest altitude conditions.

Google.title: Z Pole Baskets
Google.description: Black Diamond Z-Pole Baskets are replacement parts for any of the Black Diamond folding Z-Pole series of trekking poles. If the original ends finally wear out or have seen better days, it's easy to replace them: simply remove the old with the aid of hot water, push on the new and you're ready to be off again. The Z-Pole basket is an unobtrusive way to stop your pole tips sinking too far into soft ground. They also have an interchangeable tip, with rubber for quieter progress on rock and tarmac as well as carbide tips for durable grip in gravel and compact earth. A useful spare for an extended trip. Supplied as a pair.

Google.title: Knifeblade Peg 1
Google.description: Classic pitons for thinner cracks, the Black Diamond Knifeblade Peg 1 is designed for big wall climbs. It has a precision-ground blade for a consistent taper and a hole in the thickest part of the head to reduce weight without sacrificing durability. Two clip-ins facilitate placement in corners as well as reducing the weight.

Google.title: Bugaboo Peg 3
Google.description: Part of the classic big brother range of the Knifeblade, the Black Diamond Bugaboo Peg 3 is ideal for bigger cracks. It has a precision-ground blade for a consistent taper and a hole in the thickest part of the head to reduce weight without sacrificing durability. Two clip-ins facilitate corner placement and weight reduction.

Google.title: Angle Peg 2
Google.description: The Black Diamond Angle Peg 2 fits larger cracks, pockets and pods on the big wall or when ice or mixed climbing. The passive spring design, coupled with the springiness of the steel used, gives these pitons inherently high holding power. Plus with an easy clip-in point they are a staple of the big wall rack.

Google.title: G10 Wide New Classic
Google.description: The Grivel G10 Wide New Classic is an evolution of the classic walking crampon, with a modified front designed to fit even snowboard and telemark boots. G10s are light-weight, universal 10 point crampons with flexible linking bars, designed to meet the demands of winter walkers and the occasional snow gully. Both front and rear plastic harnesses are hinged from their respective retention posts and may be 'opened' to facilitate easy attachment to the boot, then closed securely once the boot is inside. The single strap closure system is so simple there's little need to include instructions. The New Classic is therefore ideal for rental programs and first time users. This system is simple and reliable, quick and easy, but it does take up a bit more space in the rucksack than auto and semi-automatic bindings. If you need to fit your crampons on to over-sized boots, you need the Grivel G10 Wide.

Google.title: * Eccles 28 Womens
Google.description: The Grivel Eccles 28 Women's Pack is a straightforward performer of a daypack that will excel on mountains year round. Like the popular men's version, this eco-consciously produced climbing pack is lightweight at 1.19kg, but that doesn't stop it being exceptionally comfortable and rugged for long, hard trips. In fact the light, accommodating and highly breathable women's harness keeps the pack close to your back so you remain stable and unrestricted whatever you're carrying in whichever direction. Skis, poles, axes, helmet, rope and more can be securely attached to the outside, with a side zip offering easy access to the well-shaped interior. Eco-friendly doesn't have to mean basic - the Women's Eccles 28 takes practical comfort to a new level.

Google.title: Explorer Soft Black/Alti Arc Lens
Google.description: The Explorer Alti Arc Sunglasses by Julbo are designed to protect your eyes in the extremest of conditions. They provide maximum protection from the sun and the frames are light and robust (for storage in a rucksack), adjustable and ergonomic (adjustable temples, ventilation to eliminate perspiration, easy to adjust while wearing gloves). The lenses will perfectly reproduce contours and adapt to lighting conditions for maximum visual comfort. Whilst fantastic in high altitudes in reducing the glare and UV reflection from snow and ice, we have used these in the desert with the same result. In fact we were caught in a very harsh sand storm and not speck of dust or sand got in the eyes! Making them great for all conditions.

Google.title: Vanoise Ski Touring Guide
Google.description: This guidebook provides an introduction to ski touring in France's Savoie dpartement and covers the Vanoise National Park and surrounding area. Routes across all the major areas of the region including tours of all levels of difficulty and of all styles, from one-day trips to multi-day, hut-to-hut journeys.

Google.title: Alpine Ski Mountaineering Vol 2
Google.description: By Bill O'Connor. Some of the finest ski tours of the central and eastern European Alps are described in this guidebook. It includes hut-to-hut tours that explore the Bernese, Urner, Albula and Bernina Alps of Switzerland, as well as classic tours through the Silvretta, Otztal, Stubai and Ortler regions of Austria and Italy.

Google.title: North Wales Classics Rockfax
Google.description: Classic routes of the Welsh mountains. Produced in a handy A6 size pocket format for carrying up routes. Large photo-topos supported by full descriptions and accurate approach maps. Areas Covered Tremadog, Cwm Silyn, Llanberis Pass, Cloggy, Lliwedd, Tryfan, Idwal, Carneddau This pocket-sized guide packs in hundreds of superb routes throughout the mountains of Snowdonia. From Tremadog to Tryfan, and everywhere in between, the book covers mid grade routes on the best crags and features top-notch photo-topos and inspirational action shots taking you where you want to go. The handy pocket format means you can carry the book easily up the routes, yet the full page photo-diagrams beautifully showcase the cliffs in perfect detail. The guide does full-colour justice to several cliffs never before documented with topos, such as Little Tryfan and the Upper Tier of Tremadog. North Wales Classics is the indispensable companion to your Welsh mountain adventures.

Google.title: G20 Cramp-O-Matic
Google.description: The evolution of the modern technique of climbing ice push towards a more fluid motion, more elegant and faster, therefore it demands a crampon that makes it possible: a technical crampon, and a super-light one. G20 is a crampon 100% technical, reliable, efficient and the LIGHTEST IN THE WORLD: less than 800 grams per pair. The new MONO-RAIL technology (patented) distributes the 12 points in an intelligent and original way. For information on the Grivel Range of Use, Click Here > Hide

Google.title: Long Flex Bar
Google.description: Designed to offer an improved fit and performance on walking boots: flexible and elastic the Grivel Flex Bar allows the foot free movement without over-forcing or stressing the bar even over extended use.

Google.title: Reactor 1.0 Pot
Google.description: The MSR Reactor 1.0L Pot adds versatility to your Reactor Stove System, ideal for lightweight trips and solo endeavours in serious conditions. Smaller and lighter, but it still accommodates the radiant burner head and a 100 gram canister inside. So all your cooking equipment stays together and compact in your minimal winter pack. The key to the Reactor system is the base of the pot, that accepts the burner head for minimal waste heat and maximum stability. The Reactor 1.0L pot brings this excellent performance to smaller capacity, so you can take full reliability on your lighter trips too.

Google.title: Mess Tin
Google.description: The Trangia Mess Tin adds practicality to minimalist cookware, with a sturdy lid that lets you transport your camping cook kit with ease. The standard square-sided tin is great for both cooking and eating simple fare on a lightweight trip, with a folding handle to let you hold it easily over your fire or stove. Add the close-fitting lid and you have a small, flat surface ideal for chopping or just holding ingredients off the ground. About the ultimate in lightweight simplicity that doesn't cost the earth - the Trangia Mess Tin adds an extra dimension to an old favourite.

Google.title: Mess Tin
Google.description: The Trangia Mess Tin adds practicality to minimalist cookware, with a sturdy lid that lets you transport your camping cook kit with ease. The standard square-sided tin is great for both cooking and eating simple fare on a lightweight trip, with a folding handle to let you hold it easily over your fire or stove. Add the close-fitting lid and you have a small, flat surface ideal for chopping or just holding ingredients off the ground. About the ultimate in lightweight simplicity that doesn't cost the earth - the Trangia Mess Tin adds an extra dimension to an old favourite.

Google.title: The Tick Key
Google.description: You need The Tick Key if you're ever outdoors; the quickest, easiest and safest way to remove a tick from people or pets to keep outdoor activities safe. Whatever you're doing outside, whether backpacking or approaching the crag, walking the dog or exploring a woodland, the ever-increasing risk of tick-borne disease is a gathering cloud thanks to milder winters. The crafty little things lie in wait on plants like grass and bracken and attach themselves to hair or clothing, crawling around until they find a nice spot for a meal. Though many bites are little more than a minor irritation, it's never pleasant to be sucked on by a small creature. Add to this the growing possibility of Lyme disease or any of several other unpleasant diseases, removing an attached tick as fast and in as low-risk manner as possible has to be the top priority when one is discovered. Enter The Tick Key. Small and flat to be unobtrusive on your keys or in your wallet, this remarkable one-piece device is every tick's nightmare. Simply place with the tick in the hole, slide the tick into the slot, pull and the whole tick is removed. That's the whole tick, mouthparts, body, legs and everything. It doesn't even give the little nasty a chance to infect the wound with its stomach contents. And you can retain the tick to show doctors in the case of a later reaction. Working equally well on dogs and cats as on humans it can also be attached to a pet's collar or your backpack so you don't need to remember it every time. As convenient as it is efficient and effective, The Tick Key is a small investment that could literally save a life. Please note: there are six different coloured anodised finishes. Orders for Tick Keys will be given a colour randomly unless you specify otherwise in the special delivery instruction box during the checkout process.

Google.title: Wide Mouth Cantene 1.0L
Google.description: The Nalgene Wide Mouth Cantene 1.0 litre offers all the benefits of a wide mouth bottle without taking up all that space when it's empty. The flexible container is easy to fill, easy to clean, easy to pack and above all, easy to drink from, keeping your liquids where you want them and tasting as they should. It even stands upright when it's full, thanks to the gusseted base. The wide mouth opening is welded into the top in such a way that, like the screw-top, it's guaranteed leak-proof. So the Cantene is just as reliable as the Everyday bottles, but more convenient. Nalgene's reason for the name: Convenient Nalgene Loop-top Closure. Available in different sizes up to 3 litres. Narrow- and Wide-mouth options available. Takes most water filters. Easy storage and collapsibility. Nice bottom gusset for standing upright. EEasy to read 'fill line' indicator.

Google.title: Travel Kit with Carry Case
Google.description: With all the rules about what you can take on a plane now, you need the Nalgene Travel Kit with Carry Case to ensure that all your liquids stay legal. Cheap flights save money but can be a hassle when you only have hand luggage to carry everything you need. Take a load off your mind by putting your liquids in these sturdy, lightweight pots and bottles. Sized for TSA regulations, you'll sail through security, then pack the six bottles back in the case, slip it in your bag and you're ready to fly. They're great for more than just your toiletries too. Minimalist campers can store oil and seasoning etc for cooking and soap for washing. Creams and pills are just as safe in the leakproof containers. And as they're dishwasher safe the use can change from trip to trip. Reliable, functional and packed in their own stylish zip and clip case, any traveller will love the versatility of the Nalgene Travel Kit.

Google.title: * 3+ Avalanche Transceiver
Google.description: The 3+ is a three-antenna device with a special extra function to first enhance your own safety. The intelligent position recognition system analyses the position of the antennas and automatically switches to the optimal transmitting antenna. There is no longer any such thing as the 'worst position'. The circular display lets you focus on the essentials. The distance to and the relative position of a victim. Always align the device to the arrow. The solid arrow and the central distance value keep you going in the right direction. The patented circular display shows you at a glance whether you are getting closer to the signal or moving away from it. With the precise distance value you can very effectively determine the distance to the buried victim and limit the area to be probed. The 3+ allows you to maintain an overview even with multiple burials. The number of victims is shown in the display. As soon as you have found the first one you can blend out their signal with the pin key. The victim is displayed as pinned and you can immediately continue with your search. Smart antenna technology enhances your own safety. Signal separation with pinning function. Very easy operation due to: clear control elements, precise real time display with directional arrows and circular display. Rubberized housing for protection and ergonomics. Display lighting for night searches, switchover in case of a follow-up avalanche, clear and optimized search acoustics, updateability.

Google.title: Hammock Hook for walls
Google.description: The sturdy Ticket to the Moon Hammock Hook for walls does exactly what it says - provides a solid anchor for one end of any type of hammock. Zinc-coated stainless steel is suitable for indoor or outdoor use in brick, concrete block, timber and stud/partition walls. It's supplied with a 14mm wall plug for masonry and instructions to rig your hammock safely. Now you can relax in comfort anywhere!

Google.title: Mini Back Pack - Assorted Colours
Google.description: Possibly the ultimate packable travel daypack, the Ticket to the Moon Mini Backpack weighs just 90 grams but carries an amazing 15kg! Of course, you'll probably never have to load it up that much, but the 15 litre capacity is more than enough for a lightweight waterproof, your lunch and other essentials for a good day out. Just the thing for backpackers, expeditionists and families on a weight budget. So how is it so light? Well, that would be the synthetic parachute nylon, the same as is used for the Ticket to the Moon Parachute Hammocks. This super-tough but extremely soft and light material also allows the Mini Backpack to scrunch down to a tiny size for packing. Triple-stitched for surprising strength and with an easy-opening zip-around lid, it's very useable and practical too. And it comes in a range of funky colours - call us if you want to choose. Functionality at outrageously low weight - the Ticket to the Moon Mini Backpack is the way forward when grams count.

Google.title: * @work USB 16GB
Google.description: The Victorinox @work USB 16GB brings the classic Swiss Army knife bang up to date, keeping you fully equipped in the office and everywhere. All the essential tools - scissors, screwdriver, nailfile, tweezers and knifeblade - are here, plus a ballpoint pen and the piece de resistance: a 16GB USB 2.0 flash drive. Just the thing when you need to transfer a document between PCs or take it home to work on. That's when you're not removing staples and pushpins, opening letters and tidying up broken nails. So with the @work on your keys or attached to your work bag, you'll always have all those little things you just can't do without.

Google.title: Peebol - Pack of 8
Google.description: Introducing Peebol, the pocket-sized toilet that lets you 'go' anywhere. No, really! This is a genuine alternative to getting out of your sleeping bag during a freezing cold night in a tent. It works even better than a bottle, because the granules inside absorb liquid and change into a spill-proof biodegradable gel in seconds. You can even reuse them until full thanks to the watertight seal and 1 litre capacity. Then in the morning, just dispose of with the rest of your rubbish or keep it safely (and odour-free) in your pack pocket until you get back to civilisation. Peebol is made for both women and men. Ladies, use on its own or aim using a Shewee. They're also ideal for keeping in the car for emergencies like traffic jams or to avoid using service stations late at night. And it's hard to describe just how useful they are for children on car journeys. Compact and discreet enough for a daypack, handbag, pocket or first aid kit, you can take a Peebol literally anywhere and never be caught short again.

Google.title: * Havoc 300 Footprint
Google.description: Protect your inner tent groundsheet from rocky or wet ground and thorns, stones - the Vango Havoc 300 Footprint is tough but lightweight. A footprint is a small addition that makes a big difference to the longevity of your tent, with the added bonus of being significantly easier to clean after pitching on muddy, wet ground. Made to measure for the Havoc 300 and supplied with its own storage bag, your tent will thank you for buying its footprint too.

Google.title: SEO3
Google.description: The LED Lenser SEO3 Headlamp puts the power of LED Lenser torches on your head for useable light, hands-free. As colourful as your experience, the SEO3 uses three high-quality, bright LEDs to illuminate your world. Whether you're camping, running, night-walking or anything else, the SEO3's rotating head means it always has the perfect angle for what you're doing. It also sports a glare-free red LED, so you can keep your night vision even after reading your map. Plus it won't come on in your pack thanks to the keylock switch. At 96g and with a comfortable, adjustable and washable strap, you'll be happy to wear the SEO3 all night long when needed. Especially as it has a whopping beam distance of 40 metres - more than enough to keep you secure and active on the trail, on your bike or anywhere.

Google.title: SEO7R Rechargeable
Google.description: The LED Lenser SEO7R offers massive lighting performance in an eco-friendly rechargeable form that also keeps the weight amazingly low. Using the LED Lenser Advanced Focus System of a reflector and a lens, the SEO7R has a maximum luminosity of 220 lumens, but can still be used comfortably for ambient lighting (most headtorches have only a reflector, so can't focus the beam as effectively. Oh, and almost incidentally, the beam adapts to what you're looking at, switching from an ambient mode for reading the map to a brighter mode when you look into the distance. That's Optisense Technology for you! The rotating head lets you direct the beam wherever you want it too - whether ahead when cycling or in front of your feet on a night walk. It even starts at a decent angle - pointing slightly downwards. And with the continuous dimming that comes back on at the setting last used, you can customise your lighting to optimise power usage. All this, and it still only weighs 93 grams - plenty light enough for comfortable extended wear. Major power that's light and practical - that's the LED Lenser SEO7R.

Google.title: SEO7R Rechargeable
Google.description: The LED Lenser SEO7R offers massive lighting performance in an eco-friendly rechargeable form that also keeps the weight amazingly low. Using the LED Lenser Advanced Focus System of a reflector and a lens, the SEO7R has a maximum luminosity of 220 lumens, but can still be used comfortably for ambient lighting (most headtorches have only a reflector, so can't focus the beam as effectively. Oh, and almost incidentally, the beam adapts to what you're looking at, switching from an ambient mode for reading the map to a brighter mode when you look into the distance. That's Optisense Technology for you! The rotating head lets you direct the beam wherever you want it too - whether ahead when cycling or in front of your feet on a night walk. It even starts at a decent angle - pointing slightly downwards. And with the continuous dimming that comes back on at the setting last used, you can customise your lighting to optimise power usage. All this, and it still only weighs 93 grams - plenty light enough for comfortable extended wear. Major power that's light and practical - that's the LED Lenser SEO7R.

Google.title: Hoolie 2 Footprint
Google.description: Better protection and a longer life for your tent; the Wild Country Hoolie 2 Footprint adds extra beef against wet ground and sharp objects. Shaped to fit precisely underneath the sleeping compartment of your Wild Country Hoolie 2 tent, your groundsheet will thank you for laying out the footprint before pitching. You'll see the other benefits after a night on muddy, wet ground when you pack up a clean, dry inner tent. The footprint has its own storage sack that keeps it separate and compact in your pack... or on the outside when it's really mucky. A small addition that makes a big difference to the life of your tent; buy a Wild Country Hoolie 2 Footprint to make a difference to your camping life too.

Google.title: Ultra Hyperspace
Google.description: You can take the Terra Nova Ultra Hyperspace literally anywhere - from the poles to the highest peaks, it provides full protection at fantastically low weight. Shelters three hard-pushing expeditionists on a challenge one week, then a small family on the coast the next - this is a tent for all seasons and all trips, a sturdy, dry haven for the end of every day. In the same configuration as the long-established Terra Nova Hyperspace, this high-performance four-season tent uses materials with even higher strength-to-weight ratios. That means it weighs 25 percent less, while still providing full-on protection - very impressive! In fact, it's Terra Nova's lightest three-person mountain tent. However, it's not limited to cold conditions - pitch the inner only in hot, muggy weather for total ventilation without bugs. Space, practicality and two doors with vestibules; if you need your tent to be as versatile as you, the Ultra Hyperspace is where you want to be.

Google.title: Superlite Bothy 2
Google.description: The Terra Nova Superlite Bothy 2 keeps you and your buddy covered in an emergency, but it's barely noticeable the rest of the time. That's because Terra Nova have used extremely lightweight (though still ruggedly tough) siliconised fabric - the same as in their super-lightweight tents - that packs down small and weighs remarkably little. They've also cut out anything that's not absolutely necessary to shave off even more weight. So the Superlite Bothy doesn't have windows or sockets for placing your poles to support the roof. What it does have is true waterproof and windproof protection, so if you get caught out or just need somewhere warm to have a rest, you'll be shielded and visible in the Superlite Bothy 2.

Google.title: Aluminium Alloy V Peg - Pack of 10
Google.description: Terra Nova Aluminium Alloy V-Pegs provide extra holding power for your tent in rough, windy weather but weigh only 11g each! High quality 7001-T6 alloy is strong and durable but very lightweight, making the pegs suitable for lightweight trips in potentially nasty conditions. The V-shape also aids strength, resisting the pull of a guyline or wind-blown tent by cupping the earth in front of it. Lightweight but effective, the perfect choice for any weight-conscious application.

Google.title: Tent Cleaner 250ml
Google.description: Keep your tent or bivi clean and performing at its best with regular washing in Terra Nova Tent Cleaner - water-based, safe and easy to use. While it's highly effective at lifting muck out of the fibres, it won't strip the DWR off your flysheet. In fact, Tent Cleaner will improve the performance of the water repellent coating by removing contaminants, particularly if your tent can dry in a warm place. As part of your tent maintenance regime, use Tent Cleaner to extend the useful life of your trusty tent or shelter.

Google.title: Hoodwire Quickpack
Google.description: The HoodWire Quickpack contains six of Black Diamonds HoodWire Quickdraws, now with hot-forged HoodWire carabiners on both the top and bottom. Google.title: Hoodwire Rackpack

Google.title: Stopper Set Pro 1-13
Google.description: The Black Diamond Stopper Set Pro No.1-13 features a full set of Stoppers sizes 1-13 on a Micron carabiner to protect everything from tip seams to finger cracks. Google.title: Nut Tool
Google.description: The Black Diamond Nut Tool is a simple but highly functional protection removal tool. The Nut Tool is great at freeing fixed nuts, retrieving deeply buried cams and equally as effective opening a cold beer at the end of a days cragging. With an angled hook on one end and a bottle opener clip-in point on the other, the Nut Tool is an essential part of any trad rack.

Google.title: Wired Hex Set 4-10
Google.description: The Black Diamond Hex Set 4-10 features wired Hexes Numbers 4 to 10 racked on an OvalWire carabiner. This classic, lightweight, functional protection excels in rapidly widening cracks where cams might walk out. With a subtly asymmetrical cross-section, flat sides and slight end-wise taper, they offer three different widths when turned on their axes and another when placed end-wise. Easy to rack and place in bottlenecks, Hexes come equipped with durable, galvanized steel cables.

Google.title: Drop Zone Crashpad
Google.description: The Drop Zone Crash Pad is Black Diamond's mid sized all-rounder bouldering mat featuring an elastic flap closure for securely storing gear inside the pad. With a functional and durable design loaded with features, the Black Diamond Drop Zone Crash Pad is an ideal bouldering mat for all but the tallest of problems. The Drop Zone features 3.5 inches of high quality foam (both open and closed cell) to cushion your fall when things don't go your way, and two grab handles make for easy pad shuffles. Also featured is a quick closure elastic mesh flap that cinches down so you can shove your shoes, chalk bag, jacket and other essentials into the pad without having them fall out the bottom.

Google.title: Alpine Carbon Cork
Google.description: The Alpine Carbon Cork Trekking Pole by Black Diamond come with a lightweight carbon fibre construction, a natural cork grip, and dual FlickLock Pro adjustability, making it a top choice four season pole. For the weight conscious trekker, on the trail or in the snow, this lightweight, 100% carbon fibre trekking pole offers a super comfortable, premium cork grip and the supremely functional adjustability of dual FlickLock Pro. FlickLock Pro is the evolution of the trusted FlickLock design. The benefits of the classic FlickLock design remain: it's secure, fast and easy to use. The Pro's new low-profile, stainless steel design, however, provides a dramatic improvement in quality, feel and clamping force. The Pair also comes with two sets of baskets that can be easily tailored to trail or snow activities whilst the interchangeable carbide tips can be replaced or swapped for rubber Tech Tips (not provided).

Google.description: The Black Diamond Pole Spares Kit has virtually everything you could possibly need to tune up a ravaged set of trekking poles. In fact the only parts it doesn't have are replacement sections and handles, but if you've lost those you're going to need a new set of poles anyway! Everything else is there - pins and plugs to wristloops, tips and baskets for pretty much any BD pole in existence. Much of it would also fit poles of other brands, assuming similar sizes and fittings. It's all packed into a robust and portable organiser box and small parts are bagged in their own compartments inside. This makes it ideal for mountain leaders and tour companies who loan out ski or trekking poles or who frequently find themselves mending those of their customers. But equally, it's something that support crews on big and remote challenges shouldn't be without. Simply chuck the whole thing in with the poles and you're covered for all those little mishaps that just happen along the way. Contents 2 x Powder Basket 2 x Freeride Basket 2 x Compact Powder Basket 2 x 3/4 Basket 2 x Trekking Basket 14 x Wrist Strap to fit most BD Ski and Trekking poles from 2005 12 x FlickLock to fit diameters 13.4-18mm plus elliptic poles 2 x Z-Pole Basket 4 x interchangeable carbide and rubber tips for Z-Pole Baskets 4 x Long and Short Flex Tips 8 x Friction Plugs for probe poles Assorted strap pins, strap screws and FlickLock screws. 3 x Basket Ferrule

Google.title: Sprinter
Google.description: The Black Diamond Sprinter Headlamp has been designed for everyday pre-dawn/post-sunset use as a USB-rechargeable 75 lumen head torch and is ready for any trail in any weather. With a sleek rechargeable design and excellent fore aft balance, the 75 lumen Black Diamond Sprinter Headlamp is a versatile, all weather light that's ideal for high-impact use on the trail. A red taillight strobe in the rear adds visibility in urban areas, and the lithium polymer battery recharges through a USB port in 5 hours. The Sprinter's waterproof design keeps it going strong in any weather, and the regulated design provides constant illumination throughout the battery life.

Google.title: Megamat 7.5 LXW
Google.description: The Exped MegaMat 7.5 LXW was made to prove that you don't need to be in a house to have a comfortable night's sleep. Amazingly light and compact for the weight, the MegaMat is perfect for car camping, house guests, glamping, base camp and much more. In fact in any sleeping situation that doesn't require carrying your gear on your back the MegaMat's wall-to-wall cushioned comfort and support will amaze and delight even the most hardened camping cynic. This self-inflating mat is 7.5 cm thick and is designed with 3 dimensional sidewalls, which ensure that the maximum thickness is carried from edge to edge. This also allows the mats to be placed side by side without a gap, making what is essentially a double bed. Furry tricot fabric on top is comfy next to the skin and the open-cell foam inside is cored horizontally so the whole thing packs down to only 21cm diameter. If you want the ultimate in convenient camping comfort without filling your car with mattress, th Exped MegaMat 7.5 LXW is definitely the sleeping mat for you.

Google.title: Air Pillow XLarge
Google.description: The Exped Air Pillow XL is a lightweight and packable sleeping option that, once used, will be hard to leave behind on any trip. The anatomically shaped design provides outstanding levels of sleeping comfort and head support whilst the provided stuffsack allows it to fit neatly in any pack.

Google.title: Trek Long 3
Google.description: The Trek Long sleeping mat by Vango is the perfect choice when durability, strength and affordability are paramount. The small pack size and light weight are ideal features when you need to carry your bed on your back. The 3cm diamond cut foam provides comfort at a reasonable weight whilst also insulating you from the ground, with the Diamond ripstop polyester providing a durable and tear resistant top and the non-slip base creating a comfortable night's sleep.

Google.title: Folding Gas Stove
Google.description: The Folding Stove by Vango is great for larger pans or use on unstable surfaces with its ultra-wide flame spreader ensuring your food is cooked thoroughly. It features a gas connection via a pipe with an ultra-wide flame spreader and a handy storage box. The folding stove also has an impressive boiling time of 1 litre in 6 minutes and it's compact size and lightweight means carrying it with you on the trail is never a problem.

Google.title: LuxuryLite UL Cot Large
Google.description: The Thermarest LuxuryLite UltraLite Cot Large is not only lighter and smaller-packing than any other camp bed, it's also a better sleep experience! The words camp and bed usually summon memories of squeaks, rattles, breakage and being tipped on to the floor, but this revolutionary new design makes sleeping off the floor a brand new game of cards. For a start, this Large version adds extra length and width for taller sleepers to avoid the dreaded overhang. From the tiny package only 43cm long, a few practised moves and you're ready to be warm, comfortable and stable all night after a long day doing what you love. Instead of heavy steel poles and braces, the LuxuryLite Cot raises the game with lightweight alloy edge poles and cross-poles, secured with super-smart, super-robust and super-durable nylon feet that minimise damage to a tent floor and support the edges so you can even sit on the side without the whole thing bucking you off; you don't have to be circumspect when lying down! Plus, in case the remarkably low packed weight is still too much for a lightweight trip, you can strip it to a minimal setup that only weighs just over a kilo but still provides excellent sleeping comfort! For paramount cushioning and extra warmth on a glamping or family camping trip team it with a Thermarest mattress, or simply enjoy the supportive comfort of a camp bed without the disadvantages.

Google.title: NeoAir All Season Medium
Google.description: A mat for all seasons; the Thermarest NeoAir All Season Medium mattress features the award-winning NeoAir design with extra warmth and toughness. It's the most versatile of the NeoAir range, made for hard use all year round but still light and compact enough for lightweight backpacking. Now supplied with a NeoAir Mini Pump for simple and quick inflation, the Triangular Core Matrix is highly effective in recycling and reflecting your body heat when you're camping on cold ground as well as providing a resilient and supportive pad that hips and shoulders can sink into. With an R-value of 4.9 you'll be cosy well down into the minus figures and tough fabric on the upper and lower surfaces ensures that you can rely on the NeoAir All Seasons to keep you warm on every trip.

Google.title: NeoAir Trekker Large Torso
Google.description: The redesigned Thermarest NeoAir Trekker Large Torso Mattress is a robust, three-season sleeping pad for trips requiring high performance, durable gear. The addition of ThermaCapture technology gives this iteration a considerable advantage over its predecessor, boosting warmth while actually saving weight. But the NeoAir Trekker is still outstandingly durable, with tough, puncture-resistant fabrics top and bottom and that classic NeoAir construction. To save weight, the Large Torso size cushions your body only, leaving your feet and legs to rest on something like your pack or rope. The straightforward square shape gives you plenty of room to turn over, with 6.3cm of depth for your shoulders to sink into. If hard-wearing is one of your favourite words, the Thermarest NeoAir Trekker has to be your favourite camping mattress for all your three-season trips.

Google.title: Trail Pro Womens Regular
Google.description: The Thermarest Trail Pro Women's Regular Mattress is now even better for year-round use when backpacking, trekking or family camping. Now incorporating ultra-compressible, lightweight foam, the same foam as was used in the Thermarest 40th Anniversary Mattresses, the updated Trail Pro is lighter and more packable to go pretty much anywhere you go. The shape has also been tweaked, with straightened sides on the torso to facilitate gap-free mating of two mattresses. The Women's shape also has less foam cut out for a warmer sleeping surface. But you still get the support throughout that let your shoulders and hips sink in while suporting in between. A great all-rounder for a wide range of activities, the Trail Pro is Thermarest's warmest and most comfortable self-inflating mat.

Google.title: Trail Lite Womens Regular
Google.description: With the Thermarest Trail Lite Women's Regular mattress you can have your cake and eat it - a lightweight, packable mat with great sleeping comfort. A real all-rounder, now with an improved shape to avoid that annoying gap between a couple's mats. This version is a little smaller, warmer and more supportive in places to cater to a lady sleeper's needs. Die-cut foam is the secret to the Trail Lite's success, letting the mat pack to a compact 15cm diameter but still loft up to 3.8 cm thick. Small enough for your backpack but tough and comfy enough for family camping, this is a three-season winner for a variety of sleeping situations.

Google.title: NeoAir Camper Regular
Google.description: The Thermarest NeoAir Camper Regular is about the toughest and most comfortable air mattress you'll find that still packs down to a convenient size. 7.6cm thick and with durable, puncture-resistant fabric, you can feel the benefit of the NeoAir structure from the moment you lie down. That's because the double layer of interlocked triangles not only insulates you from losing heat to the ground, it also makes a comfortable and stable platform to sleep on. But it's still light and packs small enough to be a touch more luxury on an overnight or backpacking trip. The most durable NeoAir yet, the NeoAir Camper is a versatile sleeping surface that won't let you down.

Google.description: The Thermarest NeoAir Camper Large is about the toughest and most comfortable air mattress you'll find that still packs down to a convenient size. 7.6cm thick and with durable, puncture-resistant fabric, you can feel the benefit of the NeoAir structure from the moment you lie down. That's because the double layer of interlocked triangles not only insulates you from losing heat to the ground, it also makes a comfortable and stable platform to sleep on. But it's still light and packs small enough to be a touch more luxury on an overnight or backpacking trip. The most durable NeoAir yet, the NeoAir Camper is a versatile sleeping surface that won't let you down.

Google.title: Ridgerest Solar Regular
Google.description: The Thermarest RidgeRest Solar Regular is the warmest, most comfortable foam mat in the Thermarest range, with smart ThermaCapture technology. A thicker, more insulating version of the RidgeRest SOLite, the Solar increases the amount of body heat that's retained instead of being lost to the ground. The silver coating both reflects heat back to where you need it and adds durability. Combined with the 2cm closed-cell foam in a comfort-adding ridged pattern, this allows the RidgeRest Solar to provide durability and functional comfort at low weight and cost.

Google.title: Prolite Large
Google.description: To go fast you've got to go light, but that's no reason to be uncomfortable - the Therm-A-Rest Prolite Large Mattress gives the best of both worlds. It's made from materials selected for packability and light weight, but you'd be wrong to think that it's all about the carry as 2.5cm of high-quality foam is more than enough for a good night's sleep. It's the precision cut-outs in the foam that make the Prolite the lightest and most compact mattress available without impacting on comfort. Shaped for longevity, the holes shave out the maximum possible weight while maintaining the support and insulation needed for three-season trips. Further aided by the tapered, rounded shape, the Prolite Large packs down small but offers extra length and width for taller sleepers or those who prefer a bit more space. For a quiet night's sleep after a long day on the trail, you won't find a smaller, lighter mattress than the Prolite for the warmth.

Google.title: NeoAir Torrent Air Pump
Google.description: The tiny Thermarest NeoAir Torrent Pump punches above its weight when inflating your mattress in cold conditions or at altitude. Designed exclusively for use with Thermarest valves, this battery- or DC-powered pump exerts positive pressure, inflating a NeoAir mattress to your chosen firmness in as little as 100 seconds. As space-efficient as a NeoAir mattress itself, the NeoAir Torrent Pump adds ease and convenience to extreme low weight.

Google.title: NeoAir Torrent Air Pump

Google.title: Instant Field Repair Kit
Google.description: The Thermarest Instant Field Repair Kit replaces the Fast and Light Repair Kit, being the minimum equipment you need to fix your bed on a trip. Complete with clear adhesive patches, Glue Dots and cleaning supplies, it allows you to make semi-permanent repairs to your mattress as soon as damage occur. And more importantly, the short cure times let you use the mattress again almost immediately. Instructions are included to help you make a good repair.

Google.title: Instant Field Repair Kit

Google.title: Permanent Home Repair Kit
Google.description: The Thermarest Permanent Home Repair Kit replaces the Universal Repair Kit, providing all the supplies you need to repair damage to your mattress. Accidents sometimes happen on hard trips, but when they happens to your Thermarest mattress all is not lost. This fully-equipped kit helps you make a good and long-lasting repair so your faithful sleeping mat can live to fight another day. Because the adhesives included are chosen for their strength they have mandatory 24 hour cure times, so this is definitely a kit for using at home and for more significant damage than the Instant Field Repair Kit. Instructions are included to make the process as simple as possible.

Google.title: Reactor 1.7L Pot
Google.description: The MSR Reactor 1.7L Pot adds versatility to your Reactor Stove System, working for everything from solo snow melting to group meals. The mid-size pot accommodates the Reactor's radiant burner head and a 227g canister inside for efficient transportation. The key to the Reactor system is the base of the pot, that accepts the burner head for minimal waste heat and maximum stability. The Reactor 1.7L pot brings this excellent performance to a versatile capacity, so you can take full reliability on every trip.

Google.title: Reactor 1.7L Pot

Google.title: SuperFly
Google.description: The MSR SuperFly sits in the sweet spot for cooking on expedition; it's big enough to be controllable for cooking, but still packs small and light. It's not short on power either, boiling a litre of water in around three minutes. And it's extremely versatile thanks to the Multi-Mount fitting that allows the SuperFly to run on almost any self-sealing canister you'll find. Made to allow effective cooking of simple meals, the adjustable flame and wide burner head will make it possible to eat proper food on every trip. And the wide supports are great for large pots but twist away for packing. MSR's most versatile canister stove, the SuperFly makes eating easy on the trail.

Google.title: Alpinist 2 Pot
Google.description: The MSR Alpinist 2 Pot minimises the weight and packspace of cooking for two; a lightweight but robust and well-designed pan for rapid cooking. Designed for simple duties like boiling water, melting snow and heating simple meals in remote locations, the 2.4-litre pan holds plenty of water for two or three and will spread heat to help avoid burning. With a strong Talon handle and aluminium strainer lid it's designed to pack as easily as it handles. Plus there's plenty of space inside for MSR plates and bowls or a compact stove to keep everything together in one simple package. Great design at minimal weight, the Alpinist 2 Pot is the ideal option for fast and light trips.

Google.title: Alpinist 2 Pot

Google.title: Flex 3 System
Google.description: The MSR Flex 3 System gives you the flexibility to cook like you do at home and eat in comfort and style - eating kit for three that packs brilliantly. Two decently-sized pans are hard-anodised for a durable, resilient finish, with a non-stick cooking surface in the smaller pan for sauces, vegetables and other potentially sticky foods. Packed neatly inside and between these are enough high-sided plates and stainless steel insulated mugs to keep a group of three eating in comfort throughout a long trip. They're even colour-coded, so everyone can have their own set. And the smart Talon handle locks the lid in place so you can rely on it staying together for transport. Customisable with extra mugs and plates and the MSR Flex Skillet, it's all the kit you need when decent food is the order of the day.

Google.title: Flex 4 System
Google.description: For group cooking and compact transport you need the MSR Flex 4 System, with all the pots and pans for four people to eat in style. Even elaborate meals are possible using this extensive system, which is made for road trips, group catering and base-camping. Two hard-anodised aluminium pans, one with a hefty 5.3 litre capacity, give you plenty of options for cooking for up to four hungry hikers at the end of a long day. Serving is just as easy, with four colour-coded DeepDish Plates and Stainless Steel Insulated Mugs giving each person their own personalised set. The plates are particularly clever, with high walls that keep the food on the plate and off your lap. And at the end of the meal, it all nests together for secure transport. Smart cookware that makes trail life better both for cookers and eaters.

Google.title: Pan Handler
Google.description: Light pan handle as supplied with most MSR pot sets, ideal as a replacement or extra handle.

Google.title: Pan Handler
Google.description: Light pan handle as supplied with most MSR pot sets, ideal as a replacement or extra handle.

Google.title: Heat Exchanger
Google.description: With an MSR Heat Exchanger your food is ready quicker and takes less fuel to heat up. Attached easily and securely round an MSR 1.5- to 2-litre pan the corrugated fins both shield the flame from wind and transfer what would otherwise be wasted heat into your food. So it takes less time and less fuel to do the same amount of cooking, which can only be a good thing! Simple but effective, the Heat Exchanger makes a big difference on base- and car-camping trips.

Google.title: Pole Repair Kit
Google.description: The MSR Pole Repair Kit is an important back-up for a long, remote trip, when an unuseable shelter can cause a whole world of trouble. Most standard backpacking tent poles can be shored up with the lightweight sleeve that simply slides into place. For other types, the adjustable splint makes a temporary repair to any pole of 7mm to 20mm diameter. Turn a mountain into a molehill if your tent pole fails - the MSR Pole Repair Kit offers peace of mind when shelter really counts.

Google.title: Pole Repair Kit
Google.description: The MSR Pole Repair Kit is an important back-up for a long, remote trip, when an unuseable shelter can cause a whole world of trouble. Most standard backpacking tent poles can be shored up with the lightweight sleeve that simply slides into place. Google.title: Shelter Wash and Restore
Google.description: MSR Shelter Wash and Restore is your tent's key to a longer life, particularly if it's got a bit whiffy. Water-soluble, safe and easy to use, this two-part set gently cleans the fabrics then restores the Durable Water Repellent (DWR) coating on any tent. Simply dilute the Shelter Wash as directed, rub in with a sponge and rinse, then spray with Shelter Restore, rub in and leave to dry before packing. It's as easy as that to keep down musty smells from mildew or just from long use. If you've ever spent a night in a smelly tent you'll know just how useful MSR Shelter Wash and Restore can be!

Google.title: Reflective Guy Line Markers
Google.description: Avoid those spectacular trips over guylines with MSR Reflective Guyline Markers; simple idea, big difference to safety. Attaching easily with hook and loop fastenings they'll stay in place all night, warning passers-by that your guylines are in their path. Which will hopefully keep you undisturbed as well as them safer. They also make it easier to lay hands on dark-coloured gear in the night. A handy little addition to enhance your tent.

Google.title: * DromLite 2L
Google.description: The MSR DromLite 2L Bag is the little sister of the seriously rugged Dromedary Bag; at 30 percent lower weight it's made for fast and light adventures. Stripped of everything except an eyelet for hanging and the handle that makes filling simple, the DromLite Bag is more streamlined and packs smaller. But it's still rugged, with 200 denier Cordura nylon fending off all comers. A straightforward, well-designed water carrier for when failure is not an option.

Google.title: SweetWater Microfilter
Google.description: When out on the backpacking trail you need the MSR SweetWater Microfilter to guard against contaminants in your drinking water. Effective against everything except viruses (which can be killed using chlorine-based treatments), so bacteria, protozoa, particulates and chemical contaminants don't stand a chance against the granulated activated carbon microfilter. The SweetWater is amazingly easy to pump but still packs down small and light for carrying. It also gets rid of taste and odour... it's in the name really! Clean it in the field to maintain the 1+ litre/min flow rate and pump straight into your drinking bottle for convenience. For the most reliable water possible, you can't do better than the SweetWater Purifier System.

Google.title: SweetWater Microfilter
Google.description: When out on the backpacking trail you need the MSR SweetWater Microfilter to guard against contaminants in your drinking water. Effective against everything except viruses (which can be killed using chlorine-based treatments), so bacteria, protozoa, particulates and chemical contaminants don't stand a chance against the granulated activated carbon microfilter. The SweetWater is amazingly easy to pump but still packs down small and light for carrying. It also gets rid of taste and odour... it's in the name really! Google.title: AutoFlow Gravity Filter
Google.description: The MSR AutoFlow Gravity Filter takes the effort out of cleaning your drinking water when base-camping in remote areas. Instead of pumping, simply hang the bag high to let gravity do the work of pushing water through the hollow fibre filter. Et voila, your water is free of bacteria, protozoa and particulates and can be put straight into your drinking bottle or reservoir using the universal adapter. The four-litre capacity and fast filtering makes the AutoFlow ideal for group use, plus the quick and easy tool-free cleaning is invaluable on long trips. Reliable water without the work, the AutoFlow Gravity Filter takes the effort out of safe hydration.

Google.title: MiniWorks Maintenance Kit
Google.description: The MSR MiniWorks Microfilter Maintenance Kit contains everything you need to give your vital filter pump a periodic once-over. Cleaning and checking the pump every so often and certainly after each trip will help it stay in full working order for longer. This handy, compact kit has all the consumables including silicone lubricant and O-rings so you don't have to worry if one's looking dodgy. A worthwhile investment to extend the life of your microfilter.

Google.title: Big Zip LP 1.5L
Google.description: The Platypus Big Zip LP 1.5L adds easy filling to the other benefits of a lightweight hydration system, with a SlideLock closure for security. Now flatter when filled, the new Big Zip LP fits better in the hydration pocket of your rucksack and has a quick-release hose and shut-off valve for peace of mind when it comes to leaks. Of course, it also comes with Platypus' SlimeGuard antimicrobial treatment and is BPA- and taste-free as standard. The Platypus you know, with extra reliability; the Big Zip LP is the one to choose for big trips.

Google.title: Big Zip LP 3.0L
Google.description: The Platypus Big Zip LP 3.0L adds easy filling to the other benefits of a lightweight hydration system, with a SlideLock closure for security. Now flatter when filled, the new Big Zip LP fits better in the hydration pocket of your rucksack and has a quick-release hose and shut-off valve for peace of mind when it comes to leaks. The three-litre capacity also gives you the option of an even flatter package if you put your two litre requirement in it. Of course, the Big Zip LP comes with Platypus' SlimeGuard antimicrobial treatment and is BPA- and taste-free as standard. The Platypus you know, with extra reliability; the Big Zip LP is the one to choose for big trips.

Google.title: Hoser 3.0L
Google.description: The Platypus Hoser 3.0L is the economical hydration system you can rely on - lightweight, tough and easy to use it's ideal for DofE and day walking. Platypus strive to make all their hydration systems the best in the world, letting you stay hydrated literally on the move. The Hoser lives up to this with its durable, BPA-free film and taste-free lining, welded together with a handy carry handle. With just the one opening for filling, cleaning and drinking it's very simple to use as well as to carry. Plus the threaded neck takes the screw-on hose, a push-pull cap or a closure cap for storing your water. Treated with Platypus' SlimeGuard antimicrobial technology and with the easy-clean HyperFlow bite valve it's also easy to maintain, making it the ideal choice for occasional or new walkers.

Google.title: Water Tank 2.0L
Google.description: The Platypus Platy Water Tank 2.0L holds a day's water in an easy-to-carry, highly useable design. Despite it packing almost flat, the horizontal-style water carrier unzips at the top to take two litres of water. Use the carry handles to get it from source to wherever you want it and also to help with pouring from the screw top spout. Compatible with the Platypus GravityWorks filtration system, it's ideal for lightweight backpacking and base-camping alike and will see you through many an adventure at minimal weight.

Google.title: Water Tank 6.0L

Despite it packing almost flat, the horizontal-style water carrier unzips at the top to take a massive six litres of water. Google.title: Platy Preserve 800ml
Google.description: Oh, the luxury of a glass of wine after a hard day's trekking; brought to you by the Platypus PlatyPreserve wine-carrying soft bottle. If you'd love to take a wine with you, but the glass bottle puts you off, this is the solution for you. Rolling down to a tiny size when empty, the PlatyPreserve does exactly what its name suggests, keeping a bottle's worth of wine fresh and flavourful for several weeks. Simply fill, squeeze out the air and seal for an easily transportable package. You may even find yourself using it at home. Add class to even the roughest camp meal - just remember to bring something to drink it from!

Google.title: Bite Valve and Tube Insulator
Google.description: Winter-ise your hydration system - add a Platypus Bite Valve and Drink Tube Insulator to prevent ice blockages between you and your water. It's pretty straightforward - the flexible foam tube slides easily over your Platypus Hoser or Big Zip drinking tube to keep its contents liquid for longer in freezing conditions. Then pop on the Bite Valve Cover to protect your mouthpiece from solidifying, replace the mouthpiece and you're ready for the cold stuff. Invaluable for staying hydrated on the move in the winter months.

Google.title: In-Line Shut-Off Valve
Google.description: When water is vital, it pays to secure against losing even a drop with the Platypus In-Line Valve in the hottest and most remote situations. Fitting easily into any Platypus drinking tube (with the aid of a sharp knife), the In-Line Valve offers the benefit of stopping the water before the mouthpiece, but keeps the end of the tube straight. Operated by a simple turn valve, it's the assurance you need to keep the focus on your activity.

Google.title: In-Line Shut-Off Valve
Google.description: When water is vital, it pays to secure against losing even a drop with the Platypus In-Line Valve in the hottest and most remote situations. Google.title: Ergo Shut-Off Valve
Google.description: When water is vital, it pays to secure against losing even a drop with the Platypus Ergo Shut-Off Valve in the hottest and most remote situations. Fitting easily into the end of your Platypus Hoser's drinking tube, it not only provides the security of a shut-off valve, but also turns the mouthpiece at right-angles for comfort and convenience. Smooth, easy flow control lets you see in an instant whether it's locked or not. Upgrade your Hoser or replace the valve on your Big Zip, the Ergo Shut-Off Valve does everything you could want it to.

Google.title: Big Zip SL Drink Tube Kit
Google.description: Replace your Big Zip SP's hose when cleaning doesn't do the job any more, with the Platypus Big Zip Drink Tube Kit including Quick Disconnect fitting. After long use, your Platypus Big ZIp hydration system might get beyond the help of even the most thorough clean. But there's no need to dump the lot, just swop the hose for the Big ZIp Drink Tube Kit and get going again. Fitting straight into the Quick Disconnect outlet and featuring the 90-degree Ergo Shut-Off Valve, it will give a new lease of life when your old tube dies.

Google.title: Big Zip SL Drink Tube Kit
Google.description: Replace your Big Zip SP's hose when cleaning doesn't do the job any more, with the Platypus Big Zip Drink Tube Kit including Quick Disconnect fitting. Google.title: Quick Release Kit
Google.description: The Platypus Quick-Release Kit works with any hydration system with a quarter-inch tube, letting you keep the hose in place while filling. Designed to shut off when the male part is removed, this handy add-on can save you significant amounts of time in getting your pack sorted each morning. Instead of unthreading and rethreading the hose through ports, elastic straps, clips and more, simply release the hose, remove, fill and replace the reservoir and you're away. Easy to install in the Platypus Hoser or any other screw-top system, the Quick-Release Kit is an investment that will save you time every time.

Google.title: Rock Star Helmet - Orange
Google.description: The Camp Rock Star Orange is a versatile and affordable helmet perfect for large groups and any other situations where helmets are bound to get beat up. Durable injection-molded polyethylene shell. Nylon inner structure with fast and easy slide adjustment system.

Google.title: Rock Star Helmet - Orange
Google.description: The Camp Rock Star Orange is a versatile and affordable helmet perfect for large groups and any other situations where helmets are bound to get beat up. Durable injection-molded polyethylene shell. Nylon inner structure with fast and easy slide adjustment system.

Google.title: Motormonkey
Google.description: The PowerTraveller Motormonkey is a handy little gadget for long car journeys with your devices - the world's smallest USB adapter. Sitting in your car's socket, it's virtually unnoticeable since the face lies flush. It's clever enough to stay there without draining the battery, then if you connect an Apple device, it changes its power settings accordingly. It even shuts down once your iPod, smartphone, camera battery or headtorch is fully charged. Reduce the number of cables you carry and keep your kit juiced, the Motormonkey is the silver bullet for electronics on the move.

Google.title: Solarmonkey Adventurer
Google.description: The Solar monkey adventurer is a slimline, compact 2-panel solar charger with a 2500mAh internal lithium polymer battery. The clamshell design offers optimum weight-to-efficiency at just 265g and the 2 solar panels output 3 watt max. The adventurer features auto-load, self sensing switching technology, meaning when a device is connected, the adventurer will automatically start to charge your device and will optimise the charging parameters required. The polysilicon solar panel offers photovoltaic efficiency up to 17% and features a USB 700mA @ 5v output, fully supporting Apple iPhones, iPads, iPods, mobile phones and other 5v gadgets such as portable games consoles, handheld GPS systems, e-readers, etc. The solar monkey adventurer also has a solar energy detection feature which activates the incorporated state-of-the-art MPPT (maximum power point tracker) technology, allowing it to charge your device more efficiently in low light conditions. The solar panels will charge the internal battery in just 12 hours in optimum light conditions. Users can also charge the solar monkey adventurer and their devices simultaneously, thus saving time. You recharge the adventurer by the mains (UTC sold separately) via the DC 5v 600mA socket or via the solar panel. Whilst the adventurer is being charged the LED light will be red, once the internal battery is fully charged, this light will turn green. The kit comes with a handy carabiner so it can be attached to tents or rucksacks and is made from high quality durable materials which make it both water and shock resistant - perfect for the outdoor adventurer and the busy traveller. We've also included the white Apple monkeytail cable to allow easier connection to your Apple devices, as well as a specially designed travel case. The travel case is made from a tough, condura-type material and features a thermal insulation layer to protect the solar monkey adventurer from the elements. The technical details inside the case include thin elasticated straps on both halves to hold the adventurer securely in place whilst the solar panel is open and an elastic self-securing buckle that fits through the hinge slots of the adventurer, ensuring it is held in place. The top half of the case features a netted storage area for cables, etc and the tough, waterproof zip keeps the solar monkey adventurer protected. External features include a hang loop at the top of the case and belt loops at the rear. Packed full with protection features including short-circuit protection, overload protection and low voltage protection and importantly, thermal insulation battery protection giving an operating temperature range of -10 to 90 degrees C, the solar monkey adventurer adds an exciting new dimension to the existing Powertraveller range.

Google.title: Powermonkey Discovery
Google.description: The Powermonkey Discovery is a sleek, compact and stylish portable charger that will make sure you can keep your favourite gadgets going whilst on the move. Featuring a state-of-the-art 3500mAh lithium polymer battery, the sleek powermonkey discovery offers users real power on the move. Housed in a stylish full aluminium case with 6 high bright pin point LED lights, the powermonkey discovery will recharge an iPhone twice, standard mobile phones 3-4 times, or give iPods / MP3 players up to an additional 120 hours playtime. It is also compatible with e-readers, Sat Navs, handheld games consoles, portable GPS systems and more! Please note, iPhones and iPads will require the USB sync/charge cable supplied by Apple. The powermonkey discovery portable charger is supplied with a USB to micro USB charging cable only. The recessed LED lights indicate the power stored in the unit (6 green lights show the unit is fully charged) and when unit needs to be recharged the last LED will turn red. Recharge the powermonkey discovery via your computer's USB port. Control of the powermonkey discovery is via the metal on/off button located at the top of the unit, whilst the USB port has built-in self-sensing technology which allows the unit to optimise the charging parameters for the iPhone and other smartphones. Recharge the powermonkey discovery via your computer's USB socket using the included USB to micro USB charging cable.

Google.title: Nano Lite Small
Google.description: The PackTowl Nano Small packs so small that you won't believe your eyes; incredible drying power in such a tiny space! None of PackTowl's range of highly efficient towels are bulky, but this one will make you do a double-take. You could literally hide it in your hand, but then pull it out of the mesh bag and experience the smooth texture on your face and hands. When it's drenched, wring it out and go again - it'll take twice its own weight in water, then dry at top speed. Never be stuck for a towel ever again - the PackTowl Nano is ideal for minimalists everywhere.

Google.title: Expedition Rectangular Liner
Google.description: This cotton rectangular liner is treated with Polygiene antibacterial treatment and makes both an excellent sleeping bag liner or can be used on its own in hot climates.

Google.title: *Expedition Endurance 12 Hour
Google.description: New for 2011 this is Lifesystems' longest lasting repellent. Developed in conjunction with 3M, the Endurance insect repellent is a specially formulated cream with a unique time-release agent. This enables the DEET to evaporate at a slower rate, providing protection that lasts longer than standard repellents and with a lower concentration of DEET. Protection lasts for up to 12 hours.

Google.title: Rain Cover
Google.description: A water resistant cover that protects both your child and the pack. It attaches via a simple tubular aluminium frame. The front window can be stowed away.

Google.title: Gridlock Screwgate
Google.description: With its revolutionary, patent-pending design made possible by Black Diamond's in-house hot forge, the Black Diamond GridLock Screwgate eliminates the dangers of cross loading. Designed specifically for belaying, the intuitive, easy-to-use GridLock isolates the belay loop behind its uniquely shaped gate, thereby keeping the carabiner in its proper orientation. The GridLock's I-beam spine transitions into a large, rounded rope-bearing surface for maximum strength and smooth rope feeding. Simply put, you'll never have to deal with a shifting, cross-loaded belay carabiner again.

The GridLock's I-beam spine transitions into a large, rounded rope-bearing surface for maximum strength and smooth rope feeding. Simply put, you'll never have to deal with a shifting, cross-loaded belay carabiner again.

Google.title: Positron Screwgate
Google.description: A multi-functional, lightweight and compact keylock locker, the Black Diamond Positron Screwgate carabiner's low-profile, non-snagging nose is easy to clip and clean.

Google.title: Slinger Leash
Google.description: A single, lightweight piolet-specific version of our popular Spinner Leash, the Black Diamond Slinger Leash is a stretchy tethering system for keeping your piolet attached without a wrist leash. The steel mini-clip attaches to your axe's head or spike and the elastic webbing absorbs less water than standard nylon.

Google.title: Helium Friend Size 0
Google.description: For only the third time in 33 years Friends have truly changed. The NEW Helium friend is the strongest and lightest Friedn ever, building on the unique heritage of the most inspired, innovative and copied product in climbing. Stylish, dynamic and ergonomic; the Helium Friend is designed to be the ultimate Friend and has been superbly re-engineered to achieve this aim.

Google.title: Beginners Guide for Climbers
Google.description: The Rockfax Beginners' Guide for Climbers is the instructional guide for young people starting out on the wall. Fully endorsed by the National Indoor Climbing Achievement Scheme (NICAS) and the Mountaineering Council of Scotland, it's a fun way to learn the basics of climbing between sessions. Illustrated throughout with attractive cartoon characters, the Beginners' Guide takes you in an easily understandable way through tying in and belaying to wall skills, equipment and knots. In fact, it covers everything you need to know for NICAS Levels 1 and 2, plus some of the Level 3 skills. It even comes with a length of cord so you can practice as you read. The first guidebook written specifically to appeal to a younger audience, it's a must-have for any budding climber learning the ropes.

Google.title: Chalk Shot - Refillable
Google.description: The Black Diamond Refillable Chalk Shot contains Black Diamond's uncut White Gold pure chalk, a specific blend for climbing performance. By keeping your skin dry, this magnesium carbonate (MgCO3) chalk improves your grip on rock, indoor walls and whatever else you're climbing on really. Packing it tightly into a fine mesh bag makes it go a lot further and this mesh bag is refillable, giving you an effective product that's also efficient and economical. Perfect for ticking off your next climbing endeavour.

Google.title: Powergorilla
Google.description: The PowerGorilla by PowerTraveller is the next step in portable rechargeable power sources, able to provide an extra 2-5 hours of power on your laptop or up to 20 hours on various other electronic devices (see feature list). The PowerGorilla is an easy to use portable charger that will work with devices up to 24Volts, simply select the required voltage from 5V up to 24V using the one touch button, indicated on the LCD screen, and connect your device to start charging. This varied voltage enables the PowerGorilla to work with anything from your laptop to your iPod (other mp3 devices are available). There is also the option for you to charge the PowerGorilla from the mains power supply at the same time it is powering your laptop or even charge multiple devices at once through daisy-chaining. The PowerGorilla uses input voltage auto recognition technology which means that if you use your own AC laptop charger (between 16 - 24V only), it will automatically detect the voltage level and set the LCD display accordingly. The sleek, aluminium casing has additional shock resistant rubber protection strips, making it both stylish and practical. Having been field tested in some of the most extreme conditions in the world, including Afghanistan, Madagascar, Zambia, Antarctica and Norway, the PowerGorilla is a reliable and efficient power source designed to be taken on all your adventures, wherever they may take you.

Google.title: Moonlit White LED
Google.description: The Nite Ize MoonLit White LED provides a bright ambient light that you can prop, twist, hang, loop or even wear if you wanted to and small and light enough to be taken anywhere. Using the Gear Tie Technology, a tough rubber shell over a strong shape-holding internal wire, the MoonLit can be wrapped around or attached to anything without the risk of scratching or damaging the MoonLit or the object of attachment.

Google.title: Micro Double Mosquito Net
Google.description: Using a single hanging point (with strengthening bar), and with a wedge shaped design, the MicroNet mosquito net is one of the most versatile nets available to the traveller. This Net has a 6 inch toughened skirt along the bottom to fold under the mattress. It is also impregnated with long-lasting Lifesystems Ex8 AntiMosquito.

Google.title: Cam Jam Small - Twin Pack
Google.description: The Nite Ize CamJam Small is an outstandingly easy, knot-free way to tighten, tension, and secure lighter loads of all kinds. The CamJam are made of sturdy, durable plastic with a stainless steel gate and feature a rotating, ridged cam mechanism to allow effective directional locking of the cord. Simply anchor the carabiner to any hook, D-ring, or loop, and feed your cord through the cam until you've reached the desired level of tension. Pull firmly, and the cam locks into place and stays that way until you release it by rotating the cam.

Google.title: Fabric and Leather Spray 300ml
Google.description: Nikwax Fabric & Leather Proof, available here as a spray, is a tried and tested waterproofing product that maintains support and breathability for leather and 'fabric & leather' constructed footwear. Over time, the natural water repellency of outdoor footwear can be reduced, thus allowing water to saturate the leather. Nikwax Fabric & Leather Proof replaces this natural waterproofing and therefore increases the breathability of the product.

Google.title: Fabric and Leather Spray 300ml

Google.title: Doohickey
Google.description: The aptly named Doohickey by Nite Ize is all the things you need but can never find rolled into to one key-sized tool. Made of durable stainless steel, the Nite Ize DoohicKey features half a dozen tools that do everything from tighten bolts and screws to open a bottle of 'refreshment', all in a simple key tool that fits in the palm of your hand. On one end of the DoohicKey is a sturdy carabiner clip, allowing you to attach keys to it, or attach the DoohicKey itself to any loop or ring. Opposite the clip is an etched ruler for on-the-spot measurements, and the carabiner opening is strategically shaped to function as a wrench. On the other end, the DoohicKey features a bottle opener, a flat head screwdriver, and a box cutter. With a streamlined, clever design that makes it easy to carry, attach, remove, and reattach, it's always as at-hand as it is handy.

Google.title: Gear Tie Assorted 12 pieces
Google.description: The Nite Ize Gear tie Assorted 12 piece is, as it sounds, a 12 piece set of ties with a strong, bendable wire interior and sturdy rubber exterior. The Nite Ize Gear Tie is the perfect size for bundling, connecting, and organizing everything from workshop tools to children's toys. With a simple wrap-and-twist motion, it keeps appliance wires, cables and cords tangle-free, organizes tools, art supplies, and sporting equipment, binds and neatens kitchen gadgets, craft supplies, toys, and more. Reusable, water-proof, supplied as twin pack.

Google.title: Camp Stove
Google.description: Buying a BioLite Camp Stove lets you get truly off-grid for long periods and supports a good cause, plus it charges your phone; what more could you want? If you're turning your back on civilisation for a while, obtaining fuel for cooking is a big consideration in the planning phase. So what if you could pick up the fuel around camp? Efficient The BioLite Camping Stove does exactly that, with bells on. Not only does it burn the bits of dry stick and other biomass that you find near your camp, it burns it way more efficiently than your average campfire. A small proportion of the heat is used to drive air round the chamber to enable full, clean combustion. So it boils a litre of water in around 4.5 minutes. And that's before we mention the ability to turn waste heat into electricity to charge USB gadgets. Like your phone or an LED light or headtorch - those little things that make life easier out. Compact Because you don't need fuel canisters or bottles, the space taken up by your stove on a long trip is also less with the BioLite Camp Stove. The thermoelectric generator (orange) on the side unhooks to stow snugly inside the chamber for transport and the legs fold in. So the whole thing takes up little more space than a wide-mouth bottle. Safe and fun Of course, it's not only remote adventurers who will appreciate this handy device. Sat in the middle of a marshmallow-toasting group of mates it provides the appeal of a campfire with less smoke and less risk of spreading. Plus the satisfaction of collecting your own carbon-neutral fuel. This also means you're free to fly with the stove without being stymied for fuel at the other end! Even when you're back home the stove can come in useful. Whether you live in the remote Scottish Highlands or a suburb of London, if the power goes off it's good to be able to eat a hot meal and charge your phone. Even if you do have to go outdoors to do so. Supports a better world But buying this stove doesn't only provide you with a useful piece of cooking equipment. That's because BioLite use the proceeds to bring their Home Stove to some of the 3 billion people who cook on open fires worldwide. Each Home Stove helps reduce the amount of fuel that needs to be collected and the amount of smoke produced during cooking. Which not only improves the health of the person cooking, but cuts carbon emissions too, contributing to a better world for everyone. And it provides a sustainable source of electricity that can be used for LED lights or a mobile phone for vital communications. For more information on the BioLite mission, see the BioLite website. So for conscience-friendly cooking when you head out camping, or reliable access to electricity in the middle of nowhere, take the BioLite Camp Stove and stay powered virtually anywhere.

Google.title: Camp Stove
Google.description: Buying a BioLite Camp Stove lets you get truly off-grid for long periods and supports a good cause, plus it charges your phone; what more could you want? If you're turning your back on civilisation for a while, obtaining fuel for cooking is a big consideration in the planning phase. So what if you could pick up the fuel around camp? Efficient The BioLite Camping Stove does exactly that, with bells on. Not only does it burn the bits of dry stick and other biomass that you find near your camp, it burns it way more efficiently than your average campfire. A small proportion of the heat is used to drive air round the chamber to enable full, clean combustion. So it boils a litre of water in around 4.5 minutes.
